entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
